title: Isekai Tanjou Series - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Mystery   Psychological   School Life   Slice of Life   Tragedy
tags: Bullying   Death   Death of Loved Ones   Delusions   Divorce   Emotionally Weak Protagonist   Limited Lifespan   Loneliness   Modern Day   Multiple Protagonists   Past Trauma   Single Parent   Suicides   Terminal Illness   Writers
author: Itou Hiro   伊藤ヒロ
description:
“It’s sh*t among shit. First, the genre is bad. At an age like this, a fantasy novel is unlikely to be successful.”
In the year 2006, Spring. 6th-grade elementary schooler Shimada Chika was fed up with her mother who kept preparing food for her brother, Takashi, who was run over by a truck last year. Chika was able to stay patient with everything else, but she was annoyed from the bottom of her heart with the new hobby that her mother started.

Fumie operated the PC awkwardly, and wrote a light novel using the plot that Takashi left behind. It was a fantasy novel about Takashi being reincarnated in a different world, and used the knowledge of the present world to make weapons and stood against the demon lord.

Chika, who wanted her to stop writing, consulted the former driver who hit her brother with a truck, Katayama., but Katayama was fascinated by the novel that Fumie wrote, and proposed a certain plan to Chika—.

In some pointless and hollow era, however, it was an intense age. In the chaotic sea of the internet, Love, Sin, and Desire came together, and an “Isekai” raised its birthing cry.>
